name: hyperpad-desktop
description: Peer-to-peer collaborative text editing on your desktop with Electron.
author: Stephen Whitmore <sww@eight.net>

scripts.rebuild-leveldb: cd node_modules/leveldown && cross-env HOME=~/.electron-gyp node-gyp rebuild --target=1.7.5 --runtime=electron --arch=x64 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell
